remarks: Axiom of identity of congruence, Axiom A3 of [Schwabhauser] p. 10. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Mar-2019.)
statement:
axtrkg.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
axtrkg.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
axtrkg.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
axtrkg.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
axtgcgrid.1 $e |- ( ph -> X e. P ) $.
axtgcgrid.2 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. P ) $.
axtgcgrid.3 $e |- ( ph -> Z e. P ) $.
axtgcgrid.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( X .- Y ) = ( Z .- Z ) ) $.
axtgcgrid $p |- ( ph -> X = Y ) $.
